hero.title: Computer Science Engineer
hero.description2: Computer Science Engineer and Full-Stack Developer
hero.description4: Specialized in creating modern and scalable web apps, with expertise in React, Tailwind, and TypeScript.

entries.description: Led the development of a crypto investment platform from scratch to production. Designed full-stack architectures, optimized cloud deployments (GCP), and created responsive interfaces in React and Tailwind. We got into Lanzadera and attracted 100+ early adopters.
Developed a mobile app and real-time dashboard adopted by 150+ municipal inspectors. I led the architecture and development, achieving a 33% reduction in emergency response times.
Built enterprise applications in .NET Core and React that scaled to 100+ daily users. Migrated legacy systems to a component-based architecture, reducing maintenance time from weeks to days.

Led the frontend in React and Tailwind for an ML-based price recommendation system. Created dashboards for market trends and sales. The project was awarded Best AI and Data Science Project at the USM Software Fair.

entries.title: Handy God - 2D game in Unity
entries.description: A 2D platformer with physics developed in Unity where the player controls both a stickman (with WASD + Space to move and jump) and a floating hand (with the mouse). The hand can move or dismantle objects to clear obstacles or create paths, while the stickman advances through the level.
